sys_generative_ai_config.name: Prompt name

parent.display_value: OneExtend Capability Definition: Factory Assist for Record Producers

sys_generative_ai_config.prompt: You are a ServiceNow developer. Create a series of variables for a ServiceNow record producer to serve a program with this description {{program_description}} that provides the {{record_type}} function. Consider the fields in these lists as possibilities for the label values, but add your own if you believe them to be better: {{suggested_fields}}. Make sure the name field in the variables are all in snake case with no special characters, capital letters or spaces. Create a description of the service being provided by this form, no longer than 100 characters, and always name it "description" in the JSON set. Create a name for the service being provided, no longer than 50 characters, and always name it "title" in the JSON data set. Render the output in a JSON format so that a ServiceNow workflow can create the variables and add them to an existing record producer. Return the JSON result only. Do not provide additional characters outside of it.
